column3: Upgrade
Description
Increases how many Lives you get per run at the Spire.
Increases how many Lives you get per run at the Spire.
Reduces damage taken.
Reduces damage taken.
Increases the maximum pieces of additional armor you can have at once.
Increases the maximum pieces of additional armor you can have at once.
Automatically launch into the air when all armor is broken. Extra investment increases launch height.
Automatically launch into the air when all armor is broken. Extra investment increases launch height.
Increases the speed at which broken armor repairs itself. Swimming in ink restores it even faster.
Increases the speed at which broken armor repairs itself. Swimming in ink restores it even faster.
Increases movement speed when all armor is broken.
Increases movement speed when all armor is broken.
Allows you to pay Membux to keep going after losing all your Lives.

Increase damage dealt to enemies.
Increase damage dealt to enemies.
Enables you to reset the offered floor types and rewards.
Enables you to reset the offered floor types and rewards.
Increases the chance of getting double chips during floor selection.
Increases the chance of getting double chips during floor selection.
Your Palette's common color chips will be offered even more frequently.
Your Palette's common color chips will be offered even more frequently.
Increases the number of action slots to set color chips for the Pearl Drone. Note: Hacking is required to set any color chips for the drone other than Drone Killer Wail and Drone Splat Bomb.

Learn what boss you'll face on 10F before the fight.

Enemies on Normal floors up to 10F and Easy floors up to 20F will spawn in a weakened state.

Receive more Membux as a reward for clearing floors.
Receive more Membux as a reward for clearing floors.
The fewer hacks that are active, the more Prlz you get for clearing the Spire, up to 3x. However, if you don't clear the Spire, you get nothing. (Existing hacks can be freely adjusted.)
